#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
//#include<pair>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
pair<long long int,int> p;
vector< pair<long long int,int> >  v;

bool cmp(const pair<long long int,int> &i ,const pair<long long int,int>&j )
{
	if(i.first > j.first )
		return 1;
	if((i.first == j.first) && (i.second < j.second ))
		return 1;
	return 0;
}

int main()
{
	long long int n,q,x;
	long long int s,m;
	long long int t;
	scanf("%lld",&n);

	for( int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld",&s,&m);
		t=s*m;
		p.first=s*m;
		p.second=i+1;
		v.push_back(p);
	}

	scanf("%lld",&q);
	sort(v.begin(),v.end(),cmp);

	while(q--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&x);
		printf("%d\n",v[x-1].second);
		}

return 0;
}
